item.title: Biden commutes sentences of 37 of 40 federal death row inmates
item.description: President Biden is granting clemency to 37 of the 40 federal inmates facing death sentencesâ€‹. Their sentences will be commuted to life in prison witho...

item.title: Health care AI, intended to save money, requires expensive humans
item.description: Despite the hype over artificial intelligence in medicine, the systems require consistent monitoring and staffing to put in place and maintain.

item.title: Are you contagious? Here's when you're most likely to spread COVID, flu, RSV
item.description: How long are you contagious after getting COVID, flu, RSV, pneumonia and more? Here's what to know to keep others safe this holiday season.

item.title: Gaetz ethics report says his drug use, sex with a minor violated state laws
item.description: A report by the House Ethics Committee found former Rep. Matt Gaetz paid multiple women, including a 17-year-old girl, for sex.

item.title: Honda and Nissan announce plans to merge
item.description: Honda and Nissan have announced plans to merge, forming world's third-largest automaker by sales as the industry transitions away from fossil fuels.
